commandDescription.en-US: Tells you where to listen to official music pieces of the game
commandDescription.fr: Te dit où écouter des morceaux de musique officiels du jeu
commandDescription.pt-BR: Te diz onde escutar as obras musicais oficiais do jogo

help.en-US: Type $<commandMention> to know where to listen to official music pieces of the game
help.fr: Tape $<commandMention> pour savoir où écouter des morceaux de musique officiels du jeu
help.pt-BR: Digite $<commandMention> pra saber onde escutar as obras musicais oficiais do jogo

reply.en-US:
You can listen to official music pieces of the game there:
$<linkList>
reply.fr:
Tu peux écouter des morceaux de musique officiels du jeu là :
$<linkList>
reply.pt-BR:
Você pode escutar as obras musicais oficiais do jogo aqui:
$<linkList>

defaultReply.en-US:
You can listen to official music pieces of the game there:
$<linkList>
defaultReply.fr:
Tu peux écouter des morceaux de musique officiels du jeu là :
$<linkList>
defaultReply.pt-BR:
Você pode escutar as obras musicais oficiais do jogo aqui:
$<linkList>
